website_summaries.verdict: Taken once daily, this 50 billion CFU, 14 probiotic strain probiotic powder supports weight loss, the body’s immune system, and overall digestive health and blood sugar levels.
pros: Provides relief from constipation with acacia fiber
Easy to use, unflavored powder packets can be stirred into any drink
Product does not have dairy, gluten, soy, or sugar and is certified organic and non-GMO
cons: Only 20 packets of powder per box, so not even a one-month supply
Some users report stomach distress with use, or difficulty getting the product to mix thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Expensive. Missing 1/3 or product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I don't like about these is that they only give you just 20 0f them, instead of a full months (30) supply. At 20 packets that makes these VERY expensive to purchase. Think about it, they are missing around 30% of the product in the box, so you will have just 3 weeks worth, instead of a full months supply (30) like all other probiotics. When either the price is reduced to reflect only getting 20 packets, or they add the additional 10 packets so that you get a full months supply, that is when I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: The AngelArs Foundation

customer_reviews.title: Reduced bloating and weight
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was highly recommended. My stomach started going down in 3-4 days. Weight is decreasing with proper healthy diet. Highly satisfied and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I've been having stomach issues and the doctors can't find nothing. So I started using this product. After 3 days I was able to go to the bathroom. If you take this every single day you will be going to the bathroom every single day. I noticed that my stomach was getting flatter.
customer_reviews.author: dhudson

customer_reviews.title: Best Prebiotic/Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. My stomach felt better after one packet. While taking the product for the 20 days I felt great! Just wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: CJim

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! I add it directly to a shaker ball ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I add it directly to a shaker ball of cold water and throw some true lime in and there is no off taste. The first few times it definitely had a cleansing effect, so I recommend taking when you will be home. It never has given any discomfort though. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sinnwell

customer_reviews.title: 2nd only to a colonoscopy prep
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get it to fully dissolve in a bottle of water, and there was really no taste to it but it has had a prolonged effect, which I wasn’t really expecting since I have taken capsule probiotics (blister pack nitrogen sealed) previously. I’m not thrilled with the results of one dose taken 36 hours ago and will probably not try it again for at least a month.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and will use the same brand next ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and will use the same brand next time buying probiotics. However, the packets are more inconvenient than I had thought. I put them into smoothies and they blended perfect, though with oatmeal or plain water the hardly dissolved and more clumped up
customer_reviews.author: Callie Bills

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend mixing it with something that has flavor or in ...
customer_reviews.text: It says that its unflavored but that doesn't mean you can't taste it if you just mix it with water. Definitely recommend mixing it with something that has flavor or in your shake. Other than that, I was super pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L Rex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but expensive for the number of packets in the box
customer_reviews.author: barBie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly with excersice and a diet combo You will lose weight!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective when used daily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I use daily. I wish it came in a box of 30, because the idea is to use it daily. 20 in a box is annoying. It makes your water a bit cloudy, but has no real taste. I feel it works effectively. I have it on a subscription plan so I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: jana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It upsets my stomach. I tried taking it several times.
customer_reviews.author: dar norris

customer_reviews.title: In good condition
customer_reviews.text: No issues with packaging arrived on time product was in perfect condition all individual packaging was sealed.. this product helps me poop 💩 and keep my in shape!
customer_reviews.author: Brightpink In LA

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I can not go without it. I have had issues with digestion for years and years. Even laxatives wouldn't help with my problem, I went to specialists for solutions and still, nothing worked. Then i started using this regularly. I highly recommend trying this if you are dealing with gut/digestion problems. I am so thankful this is on the market. It has saved me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Prettah

customer_reviews.title: I had read it tasted like lemon, it did not
customer_reviews.text: There for the most part it doesn't have a taste. Doesn't dissolve very well when poured all at once in liquid. I felt more bloated when taking this so I stopped after 5 or 6 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Panicdanic

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it works
customer_reviews.text: I take one about 3 times a week since every day would be too much for me I believe. I like the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ritag

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite
customer_reviews.text: This product curbs my appetite really well. I don't feel hungry, so I don't snack during the day. I typically take in the mid-morning, and it works for most of the rest of the day. I have noticed that I eat less at noon and in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good powder form probiotic
customer_reviews.text: These are tasteless and dissolve in water but you may have to wisk if the water is cold. I find it works best in room temp water. I first found in health food store but found them here a bit cheaper. I also like the individual packets, travels easy and stays fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cook

customer_reviews.title: Just meh
customer_reviews.text: I wish these worked better than they seemed to. I really didn’t notice a huge difference at all. I would probably give another brand a go.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McClure

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to take probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I just mix this with glass of water with a bit of flavoring nightly and it has definitely helped with my stomach issues related to IBS.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Vergara Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product, however there are some issues with it: only 20 packets per package and the powder doesn't dissolve completely. It seems to work well though.
customer_reviews.author: Nati S-C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Disolve
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. Will not disolve thoroughly. and don't like clumps in my drink... Room temperature water/ or cold... Haven't tried hot water,,, but don't usually drink hot water.........
customer_reviews.author: deanna manley

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: You only get 20 instead of a month’s supply, I really didn’t see a difference or the benefits of taking them which I took then daily until they were gone. I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shamara G.

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Good probioti, does take some getting use to drinking verses taking a pill. Does come in handy when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L

customer_reviews.title: Favorite probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite probiotic. Easy to mix in my protein shake and forget it’s even there.
customer_reviews.author: TypicalGinger

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No Flavor which I love, can mix in anything. Makes me Feel so much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For when everything isn't working quite right, take these for three days, it all clears up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Drury

customer_reviews.title: Feel really good about your pre/pro-biotic!
customer_reviews.text: Great either in water or a kefir drink. Definitely get results! ;)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, perfect for when traveling at broad ... balances your GI sys
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for a couple years. I love it! it helps keep me regular. i enjoy sprinkling it on my vanilla frozen yogurt!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has only a mild taste and is easy to use. I don't really know if it has benefits.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Really helped me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realized how much this product would help me when my stomach was hurting on a 3day hiking/camping trip. Came in handy
customer_reviews.author: Sherese faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic was recommended by my doctor, and I like it very much. I just mix with water and drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product, thank you for such great service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Tough to drink
customer_reviews.text: Tough to dissolve, leaves a cloudy, heavy glass of water that is tough to drink
customer_reviews.author: Amy Naum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: disolves with my vitamin c powder drink, and supplements, great results on digestion!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea P.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Mosquito in My Packet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for 6 months now but never again after tonight. There was a huge mosquito in my packet. I am so disgusted and now questioning how many mosquito larvae have been in past packets.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really good. Helped my stomach problem overnight. I don't go a day without it.
customer_reviews.author: J Rob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes me go. If you want good gut, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: audra randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Garden of Life for a while now. This product does not disappoint. Great product that mixes easily. Only a light yogurt-like taste that to me is palatable when mixed with water.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Opened product to find only 19 packets. I paid for 20. Every time I go to order this it is a different price and always too expensive. I am thinking about looking for a more reasonably priced probiotic. I have to say it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: customer5

customer_reviews.title: Knew I made the right choice
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Dr. Purlmutter and Garden of Life for working together on this product, and for also saving me countless hours of research, and sifting through packages trying to find the right ingredients. Helped me start to feel a difference on day one.. Surprisingly, it is easy to drink mixed with a glass of water. Just use a small whisk, OR put in a glass with one of those little metal wire balls and a tight-fitting lid, and it dissolves easily. Surprisingly, not too horrible of a taste.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen much difference and bothers my stomach when I take another probiotic with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-offensive taste (tastes like powdered Cheerios when mixed in water)
customer_reviews.text: Non-offensive taste (tastes like powdered Cheerios when mixed in water). Helped me to feell a bit fuller and keep will power during my trigger binge eating times late at night.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S. Coriell

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty picky, and am fine drinking it every morning
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about health products, but I can say I mix this with water with minimal impact on its taste. I'm pretty picky, and am fine drinking it every morning. At the very least, it makes me drink more water than usual. Haven't had any side effects.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PROBIOTIC
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic for to get healthy and stay healthy. Helps with the bloating and general gut health.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as Golive Probiotic Supplement Blend. Also pricy.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me unlike this. I think the price would be justified had it worked. But at least I tried it. The taste was nothing special unlike the Golive (those are great!)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! For a while I was feeling very bloated and uncomfortable with my stomach. I gained a lot of weight and I was struggling. As I began trying to have a healthier life, I started drinking this. It really helps so much with bloating and digestion. It doesn't taste like anything at all. I just put one package in a bottle of water and mix it up. It does look foggy in the bottle, but it really doesn't have any taste which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic Newbie
customer_reviews.text: No gross taste. I mixed it into water, smoothies, and protein shakes. I have no complaints and my guts feel fine. A bit expensive for 20 packets; why not a 30-day supply? Would have been nice if this brand's other probiotic products were also offered in this form. I've been working on my health and fitness and this has not halted my weightloss. I will try the woman probiotic capsules next. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No cravings!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is definitely effective. I was trying to build up my good bacteria, but after several days at one packet a day it was blocking me up, if you know what I mean. That being said I suppose I could reduce the dose as this product is expensive. BONUS- when taken on an empty stomach in the morning (don't douse in hot coffee, wait a half hour before that), it completely killed any cravings I have usually have.
customer_reviews.author: loves

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It's easy to place into shakes and yogurt. There's no taste. I can tell a difference. I've used this product every morning and I really have found it beneficial to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the best probiotic for me. It has really helped my gut and I noticed it decreases my appetite also.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carver

customer_reviews.title: Digestive problems gone go
customer_reviews.text: Really did the trick I have seen many doctors for digestive health issues. all that I tried no good. but these probiotics really helped. My husband even started taking them. I am a repeat customer
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, but I think Id rather just take the capsules over these powder packets
customer_reviews.author: Johanna & Brad

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life is a great product no matter which one you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Garden of Life is a great product. It Does the job. It has no flavor. You must stir it a lot to dissolve it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Djangorose

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is awful. Even mixing with juice it was gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take and already gut feels balanced
customer_reviews.text: Professional seller. Received promptly. Package a bit squashed, but packets soft so not damaged. Easy to take and already gut feels balanced. Will order again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is really good. I need to take probiotics on a daily basis due to celiac condition and after trying several brands I found this one that works perfect and help me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints but who knows if they’re doing their job
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Fit On The Road
customer_reviews.text: These work well for traveling. The contents dissolve completely in water or yogurt. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely can tell you this product is excellent and actually cures my balance of bacteria within a ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely can tell you this product is excellent and actually cures my balance of bacteria within a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: DPM WPB

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, no taste in a drink. You can tell it’s worjing within 24 hours!!
customer_reviews.author: MarieSmith

customer_reviews.title: Kind of gritty. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that these have a slightly gritty taste.
customer_reviews.author: kcmommy03

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Felt great. Digests fine... no after taste a doesn't overdo it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: does nothing
customer_reviews.text: this is not probiotic. It taste like nothing, therefore it does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Olah

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The box came ripped but product ok ! It’s fantastic !
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use powder. Has lots of good stuff in it
customer_reviews.author: aschmidy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it with the Raw Fit protein powder in the morning. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Naturopath Dr
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my Naturopath Dr. I was weary bc I hate powders but this is absolutely tasteless and I never can tell I'm drinking it. I put it in my
customer_reviews.author: Cayci Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gut
customer_reviews.text: Found it effective with controlling gas and bloating after meals.
customer_reviews.author: krazyforbooks

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life is by far the best one he has ever used
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried several different brands of probiotics. Garden of Life is by far the best one he has ever used. Another bottle has been purchased. I would recommend it it to others who want to use/take a probiotic!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve in anything.
customer_reviews.text: This can only be "dissolved" in unheated food, and it does NOT dissolve, so you will be eating chunks and lumps of it in your food. Doesn't have much taste, but the package says it dissolves. It does not. Not in a cold drink, not in applesauce or yogurt. Very expensive, and a lot of it is just fiber. (acacia)
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaBlondieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I do like this probiotic over ones I have had before
customer_reviews.text: I do like this probiotic over ones I have had before. It says it's flavorless but I do sense flavor if I add it to water, but in my protein shakes I don't taste it. I have candida and this helps alleviate some of the bloating and discomfort when I take it regularly. I also pair it with Oregano oil capsules and between the two, I have seen a difference in my stomach issues, which in turn has helped with my energy levels as stomach issues affect your entire body.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this shelf stable product, but I like it better than anything else I've tried. My daughter loves it too. She sticks a few of the packages in her purse and has them with her for wherever she goes without refridgeration. When you mix it in juice you can't even taste it. I have mixed it in with water too, but the cloudiness threw me off a little. It doesn't have a taste, per say, but it thickens or clouds whatever you are drinking...water shouldn't be cloudy in my mind. The product works for me. I've noticed a huge benefit from using it. I recommend it over the normal non-shelf-stable probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: but its easy to take down
customer_reviews.text: The powder has a bit of a lemon flavor, but its easy to take down. I would buy it again. received on time and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting probiotic I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: justme

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Dr. Formulated Probiotics Fitbiotic Weight Management Powder 50 Billion CFU & Prebiotic Fiber, Organic & Non-GMO Digestive Gut Health Probiotic Supplement, 20 Single Serving Packets
product_meta.description: A new approach to weight loss support designed to enhance your current diet and exercise program. For those seeking to manage their weight, Dr. Perlmutter created Fitbiotic, a Certified USDA Organic, unique, raw probiotic formula with 4g of prebiotic fiber from premium Organic Acacia (A. Senegal), 14 probiotic strains and 50 billion CFU.
feature_bullets: DIGESTION SUPPORT: This 50 billion CFU once daily probiotic supplement includes L gasseri and L rhamnosus clinically studied for weight loss support, acidophilus for digestive health, constipation relief, immune system health and more
WEIGHT LOSS SUPPLEMENT: Once daily probiotic dietary supplement helps maintain healthy blood sugar levels and support satiety with 4g of organic fiber
PREBIOTIC SUPPLEMENT: This prebiotic and probiotic supplement contains organic Acacia (A. Senegal) fiber to help good bacteria thrive
SHELF STABLE PROBIOTICS: This 50 billion probiotics supplement comes in 20 one daily packets; no refrigeration required
ORGANIC DIET PROBIOTIC: Our probiotic for men or women is dairy free, gluten free, soy free, certified organic, vegetarian, and sugar free

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
